00029 
00030 INT16U  const  OSEventEn          = OS_EVENT_EN;
00031 INT16U  const  OSEventMax         = OS_MAX_EVENTS;              /* Number of event control blocks      */

00033 #if (OS_EVENT_EN) && (OS_MAX_EVENTS > 0)

00037 INT16U  const  OSEventSize        = 0;

00039 #endif

00041 INT16U  const  OSFlagEn           = OS_FLAG_EN;
00042 #if (OS_FLAG_EN > 0) && (OS_MAX_FLAGS > 0)
00043 INT16U  const  OSFlagGrpSize      = sizeof(OS_FLAG_GRP);        /* Size in Bytes of OS_FLAG_GRP        */
00044 INT16U  const  OSFlagNodeSize     = sizeof(OS_FLAG_NODE);       /* Size in Bytes of OS_FLAG_NODE       */
00045 INT16U  const  OSFlagWidth        = sizeof(OS_FLAGS);           /* Width (in bytes) of OS_FLAGS        */
00046 #else
00047 INT16U  const  OSFlagGrpSize      = 0;

00049 INT16U  const  OSFlagWidth        = 0;

00059 INT16U  const  OSMemMax           = OS_MAX_MEM_PART;            /* Number of memory partitions         */
00060 INT16U  const  OSMemNameSize      = OS_MEM_NAME_SIZE;           /* Size (in bytes) of partition names  */
00061 #if (OS_MEM_EN > 0) && (OS_MAX_MEM_PART > 0)

00063 INT16U  const  OSMemTblSize       = sizeof(OSMemTbl);

00076 #else

00078 #endif

00114 
00115 INT16U  const  OSDataSize = sizeof(OSCtxSwCtr)
00116 #if (OS_EVENT_EN) && (OS_MAX_EVENTS > 0)
00117                           + sizeof(OSEventFreeList)
00118                           + sizeof(OSEventTbl)
00119 #endif
00120 #if (OS_VERSION >= 251) && (OS_FLAG_EN > 0) && (OS_MAX_FLAGS > 0)
00121                           + sizeof(OSFlagTbl)
00122                           + sizeof(OSFlagFreeList)
00123 #endif
00124 #if OS_TASK_STAT_EN > 0
00125                           + sizeof(OSCPUUsage)
00126                           + sizeof(OSIdleCtrMax)
00127                           + sizeof(OSIdleCtrRun)
00128                           + sizeof(OSStatRdy)
00129                           + sizeof(OSTaskStatStk)
00130 #endif
00131 #if OS_TICK_STEP_EN > 0
00132                           + sizeof(OSTickStepState)
00133 #endif
00134 #if (OS_MEM_EN > 0) && (OS_MAX_MEM_PART > 0)
00135                           + sizeof(OSMemFreeList)
00136                           + sizeof(OSMemTbl)
00137 #endif
00138 #if (OS_Q_EN > 0) && (OS_MAX_QS > 0)
00139                           + sizeof(OSQFreeList)
00140                           + sizeof(OSQTbl)
00141 #endif
00142 #if OS_TIME_GET_SET_EN > 0   
00143                           + sizeof(OSTime)
00144 #endif
00145                           + sizeof(OSIntNesting)
00146                           + sizeof(OSLockNesting)
00147                           + sizeof(OSPrioCur)
00148                           + sizeof(OSPrioHighRdy)
00149                           + sizeof(OSRdyGrp)
00150                           + sizeof(OSRdyTbl)
00151                           + sizeof(OSRunning)
00152                           + sizeof(OSTaskCtr)
00153                           + sizeof(OSIdleCtr)
00154                           + sizeof(OSTaskIdleStk)
00155                           + sizeof(OSTCBCur)
00156                           + sizeof(OSTCBFreeList)
00157                           + sizeof(OSTCBHighRdy)
00158                           + sizeof(OSTCBList)
00159                           + sizeof(OSTCBPrioTbl)
00160                           + sizeof(OSTCBTbl);
00161 
00162 #endif

00165 /*
00166 *********************************************************************************************************
00167 *                                        OS DEBUG INITIALIZATION
00168 *
00169 * Description: This function is used to make sure that debug variables that are unused in the application
00170 *              are not optimized away.  This function might not be necessary for all compilers.  In this
00171 *              case, you should simply DELETE the code in this function while still leaving the declaration
00172 *              of the function itself.
00173 *
00174 * Arguments  : none
00175 *
00176 * Returns    : none
00177 *
00178 * Note(s)    : (1) This code doesn't do anything, it simply prevents the compiler from optimizing out
00179 *                  the 'const' variables which are declared in this file.
00180 *              (2) You may decide to 'compile out' the code (by using #ff 0/#endif) INSIDE the function 
00181 *                  if your compiler DOES NOT optimize out the 'const' variables above.
00182 *********************************************************************************************************
00183 */
00184 
00185 #if OS_VERSION >= 270 && OS_DEBUG_EN > 0
00186 void  OSDebugInit (void)
00187 {
00188     void  *ptemp;
00189 
00190     
00191     ptemp = (void *)&OSDebugEn;
00192 
00193     ptemp = (void *)&OSEndiannessTest;
00194 
00195     ptemp = (void *)&OSEventMax;
00196     ptemp = (void *)&OSEventNameSize;
00197     ptemp = (void *)&OSEventEn;
00198     ptemp = (void *)&OSEventSize;
00199     ptemp = (void *)&OSEventTblSize;
00200 
00201     ptemp = (void *)&OSFlagEn;
00202     ptemp = (void *)&OSFlagGrpSize;
00203     ptemp = (void *)&OSFlagNodeSize;
00204     ptemp = (void *)&OSFlagWidth;
00205     ptemp = (void *)&OSFlagMax;
00206     ptemp = (void *)&OSFlagNameSize;
00207 
00208     ptemp = (void *)&OSLowestPrio;
00209 
00210     ptemp = (void *)&OSMboxEn;
00211 
00212     ptemp = (void *)&OSMemEn;
00213     ptemp = (void *)&OSMemMax;
00214     ptemp = (void *)&OSMemNameSize;
00215     ptemp = (void *)&OSMemSize;
00216     ptemp = (void *)&OSMemTblSize;
00217 
00218     ptemp = (void *)&OSMutexEn;
00219 
00220     ptemp = (void *)&OSPtrSize;
00221 
00222     ptemp = (void *)&OSQEn;
00223     ptemp = (void *)&OSQMax;
00224     ptemp = (void *)&OSQSize;
00225 
00226     ptemp = (void *)&OSRdyTblSize;
00227 
00228     ptemp = (void *)&OSSemEn;
00229 
00230     ptemp = (void *)&OSStkWidth;
00231 
00232     ptemp = (void *)&OSTaskCreateEn;
00233     ptemp = (void *)&OSTaskCreateExtEn;
00234     ptemp = (void *)&OSTaskDelEn;
00235     ptemp = (void *)&OSTaskIdleStkSize;
00236     ptemp = (void *)&OSTaskProfileEn;
00237     ptemp = (void *)&OSTaskMax;
00238     ptemp = (void *)&OSTaskNameSize;
00239     ptemp = (void *)&OSTaskStatEn;
00240     ptemp = (void *)&OSTaskStatStkSize;
00241     ptemp = (void *)&OSTaskStatStkChkEn;
00242     ptemp = (void *)&OSTaskSwHookEn;
00243 
00244     ptemp = (void *)&OSTCBPrioTblMax;
00245     ptemp = (void *)&OSTCBSize;
00246 
00247     ptemp = (void *)&OSTicksPerSec;
00248     ptemp = (void *)&OSTimeTickHookEn;
00249 
00250     ptemp = (void *)&OSVersionNbr;
00251 
00252     ptemp = (void *)&OSDataSize;
00253 
00254     ptemp = ptemp;                             /* Prevent compiler warning for 'ptemp' not being used! */
00255 }
